message.content:
I need to find the final depreciation item in the cash flow statement based on the transaction data.

Looking at the data, the easiest way to identify depreciation expenses is to search for any transactions with the type "Depreciation". These are directly recorded depreciation entries.

In the data, I can see one depreciation transaction:

| id | type | date | recorded_date | amount | recorded_amount |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Depreciation20240101001 | Depreciation | 2024-01-01 | 2024-01-01 | 45760.130000000005 | 45760.130000000005 |

This is a depreciation expense of 45,760.13 recorded on January 1, 2024.

Checking the entire dataset, I don't see any other entries with the type "Depreciation". This appears to be the only depreciation entry in the provided data.

Therefore, the final (and only) depreciation item in the cash flow statement is 45,760.13.

```json
{"solution": {'Depreciation': '45760.13'} }
```
